messages.title: Thank You!
messages.content: A huge thank you to residents of Neville's Cross for helping to elect Liberal Democrats Liz Brown and Elizabeth Scott as your new County Councillors.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Need an MP who challenges the government and protects schools, the NHS, pensions and all our public services.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Amanda Hopgood can beat Corbyn's Labour in the General Election. Lib Dems surge ahead of Labour here Lib Dems 37%, Con 18%, Lab 30%, Green 8%.

issues.health: Need an MP who challenges the government and protects the NHS.
issues.socialWelfare: Need an MP who challenges the government and protects pensions.

community.content: Amanda Hopgood grew up in Durham, serving the local community and helping to improve local people.

leaflet.personalStatement: I know Liz and Elizabeth will be fantastic councillors for our area and I will be working hard to ensure we return with the same energy and commitment every single day as your next MP. Support me on June 8th and that is exactly what I will do.

politicalExperience.achievements: Amanda Hopgood was born in Newton Hall and served nearly two decades helping local people.

contactInformation.address: Amanda Hopgood's Election HQ, 5 New Elvet, Durham City, DH1 3AQ

socialMedia.facebook: Amanda Hopgood for City of Durham

endorsements.endorsement: Both Liz and Elizabeth are backing Amanda to be our next MP.

images.caption: Liz Brown and Elizabeth Scott with their supporters.
